coredata.dc:title:
On 
                  α
               -divergence based nonnegative matrix factorization for clustering cancer gene expression data
coredata.prism:copyright: Copyright © 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
coredata.dc:description:
Summary
               
                  Objective
                  Nonnegative matrix factorization (NMF) has been proven to be a powerful clustering method. Recently Cichocki and coauthors have proposed a family of new algorithms based on the 
                        α
                     -divergence for NMF. However, it is an open problem to choose an optimal 
                        α
                     .
               
               
                  Methods and materials
                  In this paper, we tested such NMF variant with different 
                        α
                      values on clustering cancer gene expression data for optimal 
                        α
                      selection experimentally with 11 datasets.
               
               
                  Results and conclusion
                  Our experimental results show that 
                        α
                        =
                        1
                      and 2 are two special optimal cases for real applications.
